fermentables.notes: BEST Pale Ale deepens the light “golden” color of top-fermented beers, creating a pleasant flavor. It forms an excellent enzyme-rich foundation for intensive colored beer styles. It is an excellent base malt for brewing many different styles of British Pale Ale as well as for brewing Kölsch beer.
fermentables.name: Pale Ale Malt

fermentables.usedIn: Pilsener, Light eer, Lagerbier, Bock Beer, Alcohol reduced Beer
fermentables.name: Carapils
fermentables.notes: As used in Pilsner, “Lagerbier”, alcohol-reduced Beer, Light Beer and Bock Beer amongst others at a rate of up to 10 %. Use for foam improvement, improved head retention, fuller body. The lightest of the crystal malts.

recipe.name: 75 Shameless Magpied Summer Ale

mash.name: 11 High fermentability plus mash out (70 min)

recipe.notes:
Target: ABV = 4.4 %, IBU = 24.
Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).

miscs.name: NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water
NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water

recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter

yeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.
yeasts.name: Safale American
